definitions.definition: (preferred spelling, with æon) A spirit being emanating from the Godhead.
(Cosmology) Each universe in a series of universes, according to conformal cyclic cosmology.
The longest time period used in geology.

definitions.example: It's been eons since we last saw each other.

definitions.definition: (usually spelled aeon or æon) A spirit being emanating from the Godhead.
